scripts.zip: rm -Rf ../../saasify.zip && zip -r ../../saasify.zip assets/ languages/ parts/ patterns/ styles/ templates/ readme.txt screenshot.png style.css theme.json
scripts.svn: func() { npm run pot && npm run zip && cp ../../saasify.zip /Users/seothemes/Documents/Blockify/svn/saasify && cd /Users/seothemes/Documents/Blockify/svn/saasify && svn up && svn cp $1 $2 && cd $2 && rm -Rf ./* && cd .. && unzip saasify.zip -d $2 && rm saasify.zip && open -a Terminal .; }; func
